Name: Tough
Description: You HP max increases by 1

Name: Toxic Fortitude
Description: You have Poison Resistance (Half) and ADV on Saves against being Poisoned

Name: Iron Stomach
Description: You have ADV on Saves against effects that come from consuming foods or liquids

Name: Thick-Skinned
Description: Your AC increases by 1 while you're not wearing Heavy Armor

Name: Thick-Bearded
Description: You are immune to airborne effects that would deal poison damage or impose the Poisoned condition

Name: Dense
Description: You have ADV on any Checks or Saves to avoid being forcibly moved

Name: Cave Diver
Description: You have Darkvision up to 4 Spaces

Name: Minor Tremorsense
Description: You have Tremorsense up 2 to Spaces

Name: Natural Hunter
Description: You have Expertise in Survival

Name: Grounded Nature
Description: You have ADV on Checks and Saves against being Charmed

Name: Natural Camouflage
Description: When obscured by foliage, you have ADV on Stealth Checks

Name: Wild Runner
Description: You are not affected by Difficult Terrain

Name: Traversal of Wilds
Description: You have a Climbing Speed equal to your Speed

Name: Prey Instinct
Description: You only need 4 hours of “No Activity” to complete a Long Rest and have ADV on Perception rolls to wake up form sleeping

Name: Green Thumb
Description: You can cast the Druidcraft cantrip

Name: Attribute Increase
Description: Choose an Attribute. The chosen Attribute increases by 1 (up your Attribute Limit)

Name: Human Resolve
Description: Your Death’s Door Threshold value is expanded by 1

Name: Flexibility
Description: You gain 1 additional Skill Point during Character Creation

Name: Quick Learner
Description: You gain 1 Skill Point

Name: Human Spirit
Description: You have ADV on Death Saves

Name: Natural Diplomat
Description: You learn an additional Common Language

Name: Mundane
Description: Text
